mapper.update: update sys_dict_config set enabled = #{config.enabled} where module = #{config.module} and organization_id = #{config.organizationId}
update sys_dict set pos = pos - 1 where pos > #{start} and pos <= #{end} and module = #{module} and organization_id = #{organizationId}
update sys_dict set pos = pos + 1 where pos >= #{start} and pos < #{end} and module = #{module} and organization_id = #{organizationId}
mapper.select: select max(pos) + 1 from sys_dict where module = #{module} and organization_id = #{organizationId}
